name: MacBook Pro 16-inch
description: Powerful laptop with M2 Pro chip for professionals
full_description: The MacBook Pro 16-inch delivers game-changing performance for pros. With the M2 Pro chip — and the option for M2 Max — you get incredible capability from the ultimate laptop, with up to 96GB of unified memory, exceptional CPU and GPU performance, support for two external displays, and more.

name: Dell XPS 15
description: Premium ultrabook with stunning InfinityEdge display
full_description: The Dell XPS 15 combines exceptional performance with a gorgeous, borderless InfinityEdge display. Powered by the latest Intel processors and NVIDIA graphics, this laptop delivers the perfect balance of power and portability for creative professionals and demanding users.

name: HP Spectre x360
description: Versatile 2-in-1 laptop with premium design
full_description: The HP Spectre x360 redefines versatility with its sophisticated design and 360-degree hinge. This premium convertible laptop offers top-tier performance in a stunning gem-cut chassis, perfect for both productivity and creative tasks.

name: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon
description: Business laptop with legendary durability and performance
full_description: The ThinkPad X1 Carbon continues Lenovo's legacy of business excellence. Military-grade durability meets premium performance in an ultralight carbon fiber chassis, making it the ultimate productivity tool for professionals on the go.

name: iPad Pro 12.9
description: Powerful tablet with M2 chip and stunning XDR display
full_description: The iPad Pro 12.9 redefines what iPad can do. Powered by the Apple M2 chip and featuring a stunning Liquid Retina XDR display, it delivers performance that surpasses many laptops in a versatile tablet form factor.

name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S9 Ultra
description: Premium Android tablet with massive AMOLED display
full_description: The Samsung Galaxy Tab S9 Ultra is the ultimate Android tablet experience. With its massive 14.6-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display and powerful Snapdragon processor, it's perfect for productivity, creativity, and entertainment.

name: Microsoft Surface Pro 9
description: Versatile 2-in-1 Windows tablet for productivity
full_description: The Surface Pro 9 combines the power of a laptop with the flexibility of a tablet. Running full Windows 11, it offers true desktop-class performance with the convenience of a touchscreen and optional keyboard attachment.

name: Lenovo Tab P12 Pro
description: Premium Android tablet with stunning AMOLED display
full_description: The Lenovo Tab P12 Pro offers a premium Android tablet experience with its large 12.6-inch AMOLED display, powerful Snapdragon processor, and JBL speakers for immersive entertainment and productive multitasking.

name: iPhone 15 Pro Max
description: Premium smartphone with advanced camera system
full_description: The iPhone 15 Pro Max represents the pinnacle of iPhone design and capability. Featuring Apple's latest A17 Pro chip, a professional camera system, and a stunning Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion technology.

name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra
description: Flagship Android phone with S Pen and 200MP camera
full_description: The Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra pushes the boundaries of smartphone technology with its 200MP camera system, built-in S Pen, and powerful AI features. The Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor and massive battery ensure performance that lasts all day.

name: Google Pixel 8 Pro
description: Google's flagship phone with advanced AI features
full_description: The Google Pixel 8 Pro showcases the best of Google's AI capabilities with its Tensor G3 chip. Featuring a versatile camera system that captures stunning photos in any lighting condition and a pure Android experience with 7 years of updates.

name: OnePlus 12
description: Flagship killer with powerful specs and fast charging
full_description: The OnePlus 12 continues the brand's tradition of offering flagship specs at a competitive price. With its Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, Hasselblad camera system, and 100W SUPERVOOC charging, it delivers premium performance in every aspect.

name: Apple Watch Ultra 2
description: Premium smartwatch for extreme adventures
full_description: The Apple Watch Ultra 2 is designed for explorers and athletes who push the limits. With its rugged titanium case, precision dual-frequency GPS, customizable Action button, and enhanced sports tracking, it's built to withstand the most extreme conditions.

name: Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 Classic
description: Elegant smartwatch with rotating bezel and health tracking
full_description: The Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 Classic combines timeless design with cutting-edge technology. The physical rotating bezel offers intuitive navigation while advanced health sensors track everything from body composition to sleep quality.

name: Garmin Fenix 7X Sapphire Solar
description: Advanced multisport GPS watch with solar charging
full_description: The Garmin Fenix 7X Sapphire Solar is the ultimate outdoor adventure watch. With built-in solar charging, multi-band GPS, topographic maps, and advanced training metrics, it's designed for athletes and explorers who demand the best.

specifications.sensors: GPS, GLONASS, Galileo, heart rate, pulse ox
specifications.battery: Up to 37 days in smartwatch mode with solar

name: Fitbit Sense 2
description: Advanced health smartwatch with stress management
full_description: The Fitbit Sense 2 is your daily health companion. With continuous electrodermal activity (cEDA) monitoring, ECG app, and advanced sleep tracking, it helps you understand and manage your stress, heart health, and overall wellbeing.

name: MagSafe Battery Pack
description: Wireless portable battery for iPhone with MagSafe
full_description: The MagSafe Battery Pack magnetically attaches to your iPhone, providing safe and reliable wireless charging on the go. Perfectly integrated with iOS, it displays charging status right on your lock screen.

name: Samsung 45W Super Fast Charger
description: High-speed wall charger for Samsung devices
full_description: The Samsung 45W Super Fast Charger delivers incredible charging speeds for compatible Galaxy devices. With USB-C Power Delivery, it can also fast charge other devices, making it the perfect all-in-one charging solution.

specifications.compatibility: Samsung Galaxy and other USB-C devices

name: Anker PowerCore 26800 Portable Charger
description: High-capacity power bank for multiple device charges
full_description: The Anker PowerCore 26800 packs enough power to charge most smartphones over 6 times. With three USB output ports and dual input ports for faster recharging, it's the perfect companion for travel, emergencies, or everyday use.

name: OtterBox Defender Series Case
description: Rugged protection case for smartphones
full_description: The OtterBox Defender Series provides legendary protection for your smartphone. With a multi-layer defense system including a solid inner shell, outer slipcover, and built-in screen protector, it guards against drops, bumps, and scratches.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5
description: Premium wireless noise-cancelling headphones
full_description: The Sony WH-1000XM5 sets a new standard for noise cancellation with eight microphones and two processors. Featuring exceptional sound quality, a lightweight design, and up to 30 hours of battery life, they deliver an unmatched listening experience.

specifications.features: Touch controls, speak-to-chat, DSEE Extreme upscaling

name: Apple AirPods Pro 2
description: Premium wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation
full_description: The AirPods Pro 2 offer a magical audio experience with personalized spatial audio, advanced active noise cancellation, and a transparency mode that lets you hear the world around you. The MagSafe charging case with built-in speaker and lanyard loop adds even more convenience.

specifications.battery: Up to 6 hours listening time, 30 hours with case
specifications.features: Active Noise Cancellation, Adaptive Transparency, Spatial Audio
specifications.ear tips: Four sizes included (XS, S, M, L)

name: Bose QuietComfort Ultra Headphones
description: Premium headphones with spatial audio and world-class noise cancellation
full_description: The Bose QuietComfort Ultra Headphones deliver the ultimate listening experience with Bose Immersive Audio that transforms stereo content into a spatial, multidimensional experience. World-class noise cancellation and CustomTune technology tailor the audio performance to you.

name: Sennheiser Momentum 4 Wireless
description: Premium headphones with exceptional sound and battery life
full_description: The Sennheiser Momentum 4 Wireless headphones combine audiophile-grade sound with incredible 60-hour battery life. Advanced adaptive noise cancellation, intuitive touch controls, and premium comfort make these perfect for extended listening sessions.

specifications.features: Adaptive noise cancellation, transparency mode, multipoint connection

name: Sonos Era 300
description: Premium smart speaker with spatial audio and room-filling sound
full_description: The Sonos Era 300 delivers an unmatched spatial audio experience with its unique hourglass design and six precisely angled drivers. It adapts to your room's acoustics and connects seamlessly with your existing Sonos system for whole-home audio.

specifications.audio: Spatial audio with Dolby Atmos support
specifications.features: Trueplay tuning, stereo pairing, Sonos app control

name: Bose Smart Soundbar 900
description: Premium Dolby Atmos soundbar with spatial audio
full_description: The Bose Smart Soundbar 900 transforms your TV experience with Dolby Atmos and Bose's proprietary TrueSpace technology that analyzes and upmixes content for an immersive experience. Voice assistants, AirPlay 2, and Bluetooth give you multiple ways to enjoy your audio.

specifications.connectivity: HDMI eARC, optical, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, AirPlay 2
specifications.voice control: Google Assistant and Amazon Alexa built-in
specifications.expandability: Compatible with Bose bass modules and surround speakers

name: JBL Charge 5
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with powerful sound and power bank function
full_description: The JBL Charge 5 delivers bold JBL Original Pro Sound with its optimized long excursion driver, separate tweeter, and dual passive radiators. IP67 waterproof and dustproof design makes it perfect for any adventure, while the built-in power bank keeps your devices charged.

specifications.features: JBL PartyBoost for multiple speaker pairing, power bank functionality

name: Ultimate Ears MEGABOOM 3
description: Portable 360-degree Bluetooth speaker with deep bass
full_description: The Ultimate Ears MEGABOOM 3 delivers intense, immersive 360-degree sound with deep, heart-pounding bass. The virtually indestructible design is waterproof, dustproof, and floats in water. With 20-hour battery life and one-touch music control, it's the ultimate portable party speaker.

specifications.waterproof: IP67 waterproof and dustproof, floats in water
specifications.features: Magic Button for one-touch music control, PartyUp with 150+ speakers

name: LG C2 65-inch OLED TV
description: Premium OLED TV with stunning picture quality
full_description: The LG C2 65-inch OLED TV delivers breathtaking picture quality with infinite contrast, perfect black, and over a billion colors. Powered by the α9 Gen5 AI Processor 4K, it adapts to what you're watching for stunning picture and sound. Perfect for movies, sports, and gaming with NVIDIA G-SYNC, FreeSync Premium, and VRR support.

specifications.gaming: 4 HDMI 2.1 ports, G-SYNC, FreeSync Premium, VRR, ALLM

name: Samsung QN90B Neo QLED 4K TV
description: Premium 4K Neo QLED TV with mini-LED technology
full_description: The Samsung QN90B Neo QLED TV combines Mini LED technology with Quantum Matrix Technology Pro for exceptional brightness, contrast, and color. The Neural Quantum Processor 4K optimizes every scene, while anti-reflection technology and wide viewing angles ensure everyone gets the best seat in the house.

specifications.gaming: Motion Xcelerator Turbo+, FreeSync Premium Pro, 4 HDMI ports

name: Sony X95L 4K Mini LED TV
description: Premium 4K Mini LED TV with Cognitive Processor XR
full_description: The Sony X95L combines Mini LED technology with Sony's Cognitive Processor XR to deliver exceptional brightness, color, and contrast. XR Backlight Master Drive provides precise local dimming control, while XR Motion Clarity ensures smooth motion even in fast-paced scenes.

name: Apple TV 4K (2023)
description: Powerful streaming device with A15 Bionic chip
full_description: The Apple TV 4K (2023) delivers a cinematic experience with 4K Dolby Vision, HDR10+, and Dolby Atmos. Powered by the A15 Bionic chip, it offers next-level performance for gaming and apps. The redesigned Siri Remote makes navigation intuitive, while deep integration with Apple devices enhances the user experience.

name: PlayStation 5
description: Next-generation gaming console with ultra-high-speed SSD
full_description: The PlayStation 5 redefines next-gen gaming with breathtaking 4K graphics, lightning-fast loading times thanks to the custom SSD, and the innovative DualSense controller with haptic feedback and adaptive triggers. Experience new worlds with 3D Tempest AudioTech and a growing library of exclusive games.

name: Xbox Series X
description: Microsoft's most powerful gaming console ever
full_description: The Xbox Series X is Microsoft's fastest, most powerful console ever. Experience next-gen gaming with 4K at up to 120 FPS, DirectX raytracing, variable refresh rate, and an ultra-high-speed SSD. Quick Resume lets you seamlessly switch between games, while thousands of games across four generations play better than ever.

name: Nintendo Switch OLED Model
description: Versatile gaming console with vibrant OLED display
full_description: The Nintendo Switch OLED Model features a vibrant 7-inch OLED screen, a wide adjustable stand, enhanced audio, and 64GB of internal storage. Play anywhere with three versatile play modes: TV mode, handheld mode, or tabletop mode, and enjoy a vast library of Nintendo games.

specifications.connectivity: Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.1, wired LAN port in dock

name: Steam Deck 512GB
description: Handheld gaming PC with access to Steam library
full_description: The Steam Deck is a powerful, portable gaming PC that lets you take your Steam library on the go. With its custom AMD APU and 512GB of high-speed NVMe SSD storage, it delivers a console-like gaming experience with access to thousands of PC games. The premium anti-glare etched glass and exclusive carrying case make it the ultimate portable gaming solution.

specifications.processor: Custom AMD APU, Zen 2 4c/8t, RDNA 2 GPU
